imdb.title: Gegege no Kitaro
imdb.plot: The adventures of a young spirit boy and his friends.

episodes.title: The Day Yokai Awoke
episodes.plot: Mana is a teenage human with a kind heart and keen sense of justice. After summoning Kitaro to save her city from a yokai attack, she insists on joining the fight.

episodes.title: Terror! Miage-Nyudo
episodes.plot: Greedy Nezumi Otomo makes a fortune helping an evil yokai, and Mana proves herself worthy of being Kitaro's friend and ally.

episodes.title: Tantanbo's Yokai Castle
episodes.plot: Children are going missing, and Mara helps Kitaro and his yokai friends track them down.

episodes.title: The Taboo of the Mysterious Forest
episodes.plot: Mana makes the mistake of telling a younger friend about the Gegege Forest, where Kitaro has warned her no humans must ever go.

episodes.title: The Disaster of the Electric Yokai
episodes.plot: Nezumi Otoko has the very bad idea of exploiting the power of an ancient yokai to produce cheap electricity.

episodes.title: The Misfortune of the Sunekosuri
episodes.plot: Befriending a stray cat puts a lonely woman in an unexpectedly dangerous situation.

episodes.title: Ghost Train
episodes.plot: An evil human meets his match when he crosses Kitaro.

episodes.title: Menace! Kagami-Jijii's Plot
episodes.plot: Kitaro and Neko Musume search for Mana after a yokai pulls her through a mirror into an alternate dimension.

episodes.title: The Kappas' Work Reform
episodes.plot: An unscrupulous human employer uses a loophole in Japanese labor law to viciously exploit a group of kappas.

episodes.title: Vanishing! The Seven School Mysteries
episodes.plot: When Hanako the bathroom ghost and other resident spirits at Mana's high school go missing, Mana and Neko Musume investigate.

episodes.title: Conquer Japan! The 808 Tanuki Army
episodes.plot: Kitaro and his friends defend Japan from an invading horde of hostile tanuki.

episodes.title: Capital Annihilated! The Terrifying Yokai Beast
episodes.plot: The people and yokai of Japan struggle under their tanuki overlords' reign of terror.

episodes.title: Diamonds of Greed! Wanyudo's Trap
episodes.plot: Nezumi Otoko's latest business deal involves a cruel game of greed and deception.

episodes.title: Makura-Gaeshi and the Fantastic Dream
episodes.plot: Mana, Kitaro and Neko Musume undertake a dangerous mission to the land of dreams to reunite a child and his father.

episodes.title: Zunbera Spiritplasty
episodes.plot: An ordinary-looking teenage girl must decide how far she's willing to go in order to have the beautiful face of her dreams.

episodes.title: The Mystery of the Tide! Umizato
episodes.plot: Mana calls on her yokai friends for help when a boatload of men, including her uncle, go missing at sea.

episodes.title: Kani-Bozu and the Ancient Mystery
episodes.plot: Mana and her yokai friends must solve a mystery involving a riddling phantom.

episodes.title: Yokai Resurrection?! The Ghost School"
episodes.plot: Mana, Kitaro and friends investigate a school for human kids run by a pack of shady yokai.

episodes.title: Memories of the Yoka
episodes.plot: A meeting with her reclusive great aunt sends Mana on a quest to discover the origins of a mysterious tropical flower.

episodes.title: Flame on! The Solitude of the Takuro-Bi
episodes.plot: Exploited by Nezumi Otoko as a fairground attraction, a lonesome yokai makes friends with a robot.

episodes.title: Berserk!! The Terrifying Yokai, Gyuki
episodes.plot: A resort town's local legend of a giant monster with the head of a bull and the body of an arthropod turns out to be terrifyingly true.

episodes.title: The Yokai Apartment Secret Story
episodes.plot: The extraordinary history of an apartment building haunted by three yokai.

episodes.title: Rat Man's disappearance?! Sekiyo's Trap
episodes.plot: Nezumi Otoko meets his match in a yokai seductress who's as wicked and ruthless as he is.

episodes.title: Kuribe-Oni's Curse
episodes.plot: Mana and her high school classmates become the targets of a predatory smartphone app.

episodes.title: Infatuation the Alluring Gahi
episodes.plot: A human girl finds a magical scroll containing the spirit of a dangerously seductive yokai.

episodes.title: Invasion! The Backbeard Army
episodes.plot: After failing to stop the American yokai Backbeard and his army of monsters from invading Japan, Agnes the teenage witch asks Kitaro for help.

episodes.title: The Great Yokai War
episodes.plot: Agnes the teenage witch casts a spell on Kitaro in a desperate attempt to halt the Western monster army's occupation of Japan.

episodes.title: The Mad Frankenstein
episodes.plot: Like Kitaro before her, Agnes the witch discovers that Mana, despite being human, can be a supernatural being's best friend.

episodes.title: The Vampire's Halloween Party
episodes.plot: Neko Musume and Mana attend a scary VR Halloween show, only to find themselves trapped by the vampire invader Carmilla.

episodes.title: Azuki-Arai, Azuki-Hakari, Azuki-Babaa
episodes.plot: Feeling left behind by modern Japanese culture, three azuki bean-loving yokai take to social media to educate humans about the pleasures of traditional azuki based snacks.

episodes.title: Demon Belial the Hundred-Year Grudge
episodes.plot: Kojiro the teenage tengu accidentally releases a long-imprisoned Portuguese yokai.

episodes.title: The Fox's Wedding and Hakusanbo
episodes.plot: An innocent teenage girl becomes the subject of a battle between Western yokai and a fearsome kitsune.

episodes.title: Emporer Backbeard
episodes.plot: The mastermind of the Western yokai invasion plots to destroy Agnes' alliance with Kitaro and his clan.

episodes.title: The Witches of Destiny
episodes.plot: Agnes reveals the terrible secrets of the Ring of Arcana and Brigadoon Project.

episodes.title: The Transform All Japanese Yokai Project
episodes.plot: Mana finds the Ring of Arcana, setting in motion a series of fateful events.

episodes.title: Showdown!! Backbeard
episodes.plot: Backbeard confronts Agnes with a choice: sacrifice her friends, or cast the spell that will start the Brigadoon.

episodes.title: New Year's Man-Eating Fable Kasha
episodes.plot: Nezumi Otomo's latest get rich quick scheme involves supplying a ghoulish yokai with fresh human corpses.

episodes.title: Yuki-Onna Pure White Love Report
episodes.plot: A teenage yokai is confused by her human boyfriend's affection for her.

episodes.title: The Final Ballad Sara-Kozo
episodes.plot: A human entertainer overhears a kappa's song and uses it in his act. Bad idea.

episodes.title: Enigma! The Bake-Zori Rebellion
episodes.plot: Useful household objects, abandoned by their owner, grapple with feelings of grief and resentment.

episodes.title: Momon-Jii's Scheme: The Great Yokai Trail
episodes.plot: Kitaro is accused of an unprovoked attack on an innocent fellow yokai.

episodes.title: Eternal Life Odoro-Odoro
episodes.plot: A human scientist turns himself into a predatory yokai.

episodes.title: Masquerade Nopperabo
episodes.plot: An up and coming star just can't get in synch with the part he's been hired to play.

episodes.title: The Truth Lies in the Thicket of the Mannen-dake
episodes.plot: Humans disappear mysteriously in a bamboo forest that's about to be cut down.

episodes.title: The Cursed Doll Festival Mayuge
episodes.plot: Nezumi Otoko sells some suspiciously inexpensive hina dolls to an instructor at Mana's school.

episodes.title: The Baby-Stealing Ubume
episodes.plot: A social media influencer who livestreams yokai activity causes a dangerous rift between humans and yokai.

episodes.title: The Void of Despair and Darkness
episodes.plot: The mysterious Nanashi's terrible purpose in stirring up yokai-human conflict is revealed.

episodes.title: Nanashi and Mana
episodes.plot: Kitaro and Mana must overcome the hate towards each other that Nanashi created in order to defeat him.

episodes.title: Messenger from the Underworld Nue
episodes.plot: Investigating a yokai attack in a farming village, Kitaro encounters an unexpected adversary.

episodes.title: Enma Daio's Secret Bargain
episodes.plot: Rei the yokai hunter complicates Kitaro's quest to capture the Four Treasonous Generals.

episodes.title: Runaway Girl! The Forest of the Kinoko
episodes.plot: A friend of Mana's finds out why, generally speaking, humans and yokai don't mix.

episodes.title: Narcissism Overload! Nuke Kubi's Close Call
episodes.plot: Obnoxious, publicity seeking online influencer Charatomi forms a disastrous partnership with obnoxious, publicity seeking orange yokai Nuke Kubi.

episodes.title: Dorotabo, Life and Earth
episodes.plot: An arrogant human is determined to build on land controlled by a powerful yokai.

episodes.title: Hihi's Harassment Hell
episodes.plot: An ambitious human tennis player is coached by an aggressive yokai.

episodes.title: The Bewitching Melody Elite the Vampire
episodes.plot: Another Western yokai arrives to conquer Japan: a blood-drinking fiend who controls his victims with his guitar.

episodes.title: The Bloody Noble La Siene
episodes.plot: Yet another Western vampire terrorizes Japan, this time on behalf of Backbeard.

episodes.title: The Han Gyojin's Strange Kamaboko Tale
episodes.plot: An ocean yokai who runs a factory that makes imitation crab finds ingenious ways to exploit Kitaro.

episodes.title: Promise to the Female Yokai Ushirogami
episodes.plot: A mysterious cactus causes the disappearance of random humans and a dog.

episodes.title: Pitch-Black Coldness: The Youkai Buru-Buru
episodes.plot: Mana's camping trip is interrupted by a malicious yokai.

episodes.title: Tofu-Kozo's Mold Pandemic
episodes.plot: Depressed pop idol Kana gets encouragement from her yokai friend Tofu Kozo.

episodes.title: The Four Generals of the Underworld: Kurobozu's Trap
episodes.plot: A scheming yokai poisons the humans' water supply.

episodes.title: The Star Festival of Love: The Youkai Flower
episodes.plot: Kitaro investigates a bamboo forest where a resident spirit is reportedly attacking humans.

episodes.title: The Heart's Darkness: The Suiko Reflects
episodes.plot: A desperate woman gets help from a dangerous yokai.

episodes.title: Nation Founding?! Mabyo's Great Tottori Empire
episodes.plot: Arriving in Tottori Prefecture to visit her aunt and uncle, Mana and her yokai friends are shocked to find out it's seceded from Japan and become a weird totalitarian society.

episodes.title: The Shinigami and Sakaiminato's Hidden Village
episodes.plot: Mana is kidnapped by an entity that harvests the souls of children.

episodes.title: The Social Media Addict Versus the Jomon Man
episodes.plot: Nezumi Otomo discovers a prehistoric human and turns him into a social media star.

episodes.title: Capital Punishment! Exiled to the Underworld
episodes.plot: A young criminal on the run accepts a ride from Kitaro.

episodes.title: General of the Underworld: The Kido, Ibukimaru
episodes.plot: Kitaro pursues a powerful oni who's one of the Treasonous Generals.

episodes.title: Spirit Affliction: Mysterious Footprints
episodes.plot: A young man rebels against his family's tradition of guarding a sacred stone.

episodes.title: Karakasa's Umbrella Troubles
episodes.plot: Karakasa takes matters in his own hands when he sees a man treating one of his fellow umbrellas with disrespect.

episodes.title: Iyami the Yokai's Great Love Project
episodes.plot: A mischievous yokai casts spells that make Kitaro and his friends crazy with love.

episodes.title: The Yamata-no-Orochi of Greed
episodes.plot: An eight-headed dragon grants a human eight wishes.

episodes.title: The Fall of the Underworld?! Tamamo-no-Mae's Trap
episodes.plot: Kitaro and Rei race to catch Kyubi no Kitsune, the last Treasonous General still at large.

episodes.title: Kyubi no Kitsune
episodes.plot: As the kitsune continues destroying the realms of the living and dead, Rei persists in his quest to obliterate all yokai, including Kitaro.

episodes.title: Nurarihyon's Ambition
episodes.plot: Humans cut down a 300-year-old forest, enraging its resident yokai.

episodes.title: Vanishing Humans! Neko-sennin's Revenge
episodes.plot: A sadistic yokai forces humans to experience the types of suffering they inflict on domestic cats.

episodes.title: The Moryo of Mukuro Village
episodes.plot: A death-obsessed photographer claims to be pursued by a ghost.

episodes.title: Komori-Neko's Halloween Pandemonium
episodes.plot: One of Backbeard's minions visits Tokyo on Halloween, hoping to collect blood to resurrect his master.

episodes.title: Onmoraki's Trap
episodes.plot: Worried about the well-being of one of her classmates, Mana asks Kitaro and Neko Musume to investigate.

episodes.title: Hot Blooded Manga Artist: The Yokai Hiderigami
episodes.plot: Aspiring manga artist Hiderigami encounters anti-yokai prejudice in the publishing industry.

episodes.title: Geriatric Nuppeppo
episodes.plot: Kitaro and friends investigate the manufacturers of an anti-aging cream that does the opposite of what it's supposed to do.

episodes.title: Chain of Hatred: The Yokai Hoko
episodes.plot: Yokai living in a 2000 year old camphor tree seek revenge when it's cut down.

episodes.title: Chin-san, The Foreign Worker
episodes.plot: Mana befriends a yokai from the South Pacific who's determined to make good in Japan.

episodes.title: The Giant, Daidarabotchi
episodes.plot: A mysterious cult reanimates the ancient guardian spirit of Mt. Fuji.

episodes.title: Bloody Christmas
episodes.plot: Santa Claus seems to be the culprit in a series of child disappearances.

episodes.title: The Binbogami and The Zashiki-Warashi
episodes.plot: The owners of a small cafe discover that they have an unseen visitor.

episodes.title: Ittan-Momen's Romance
episodes.plot: Nezumi Otoko starts a human-yokai dating service.

episodes.title: The Curse of Te-no-Me
episodes.plot: A sinister force is causing humans to harm themselves.

episodes.title: Idol Legend Sazae-Oni
episodes.plot: Kitaro investigates the baffling origins of a viral video featuring a Kitaro impersonator and a baby mermaid.

episodes.title: The Misty Night of Angkor Wat
episodes.plot: A famous dramatist is haunted by the tragic and mysterious loss of his wife.

episodes.title: The Writer is Ama-no-Jaku
episodes.plot: A yokai who loves doing cruel things to humans gets his own reality show.

episodes.title: The Phantom Train
episodes.plot: Neko Musume must travel back in time to save the world from a vampire invasion.

episodes.title: The Lazy Fujimi Hot Springs Bus Trip
episodes.plot: At a hot spring spa near Mt. Fuji, Mana volunteers to deliver a tribute to the local earth spirit.

episodes.title: The Great Yokai Alliance
episodes.plot: Nurarihyon and Blackbeard start a war between humans and yokai.

episodes.title: The Second Great Yokai War
episodes.plot: Nurarihyon reveals his plan for world domination and Kitaro's friends come to his rescue.

episodes.title: The World You See is Not Everything
episodes.plot: Overwhelmed by the futility of trying to save the world from evil, Kitaro succumbs to despair.
